document.full_text: authorities on tuesday arrested a recently paroled bank robber suspected of planting a bomb at a crowded shopping mall near columbine high school last week on the 12th anniversary of the school massacre.
document.title: suspect arrested in columbine-area bombing attempt
lines_and_colors: authorities on tuesday arrested a recently paroled bank robber suspected of planting a bomb at a crowded shopping mall near columbine high school last week on the 12th anniversary of the school massacre.
